title: Supporting sustainability, digital health, and the future of work
summary: The MIT and Accenture Convergence Initiative has selected three new research projects focused on sustainability, digital health, and the future of work. The projects aim to address complex societal needs through technology and innovation. The first project will explore how industrial clusters can facilitate the transition to clean energy. The second project aims to create a return-on-investment calculator for childhood obesity interventions. The third project will use AI algorithms to reshape the future of work in the post-pandemic era. The initiative brings together experts from academia and business to share insights and advance data-driven research.
